room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: My family and I had a amazing time with our guide Adam at the Kidnapping room in Marlborough.  Adam was very nice and helped us when we needed.  He also dropped useful hints throughout and made our overall experience a whole lot better than it already was and we cannot wait to come back and try out some of the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: First time trying any kind of escape room, it was so much fun! Challenging but great! Steve, our game manager, was incredible and helped us a few times! Our party of four successfully broke out of the Kidnapping room. Will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: We went with a group for "The Kidnapping" last night and has a blast. Very creative, fun, and thought provoking. We highly recommend Breakout!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Tried the Kidnapping with a group of eight first-timers. We all had a blast! A tough and well thought out room. Great staff too.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Went to try the Kidnapping room at the Woburn location and it was great! Had a super fun time with my co-workers. Our guide Alex was fantastic and she made this a truly great experience. Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: We had a blast in the Kidnapping room. We missed the clock by a minute! Our kids loved it too. We can't wait to try a different room. The staff was also very helpful.
